column2: name=Mines of Moria II: The Escape Out
}}'''Mines of Moria II: The Escape Out''' is the sequel to ''[[Mines of Moria (video game)
column3: Mines of Moria]]'' and the second part in the ''[[Mines of Moria (video game series)
column4: Mines of Moria]]'' trilogy.<ref name="Tolkien Games">[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/mom2.html Mines of Moria II: The Escape Out] at Tolkien Games (retrieved 19 April 2011)</ref><ref name="El Anillo">[http://www.meristation.com/v3/des_articulo.php?pic=GEN&id=2254&idj=&idp=&tipo=art&c=1&pos=9 Meristation, El Anillo interactivo] p. 10 (retrieved 19 April 2011)</ref> In this part [[Feagwaith]], the hero from the first game, has found ''[[Mithril]]'' in [[Moria]] and must now find his way out.<ref name="Tolkien Games"/><ref name="El Anillo"/> It is designed by [[Adam Roberts]] with [[Klik & Play]].<ref name="Tolkien Games"/><ref>[http://tieba.baidu.com/f?kz=177120564 Baidu, 托尔金相关游戏简介] (retrieved 19 April 2011)</ref>
